title: High Dependence on Travel Services
description: In 2023, travel services accounted for 73.59% of Lesotho's service imports, indicating a significant reliance on this sector.

title: Low ICT Service Exports
description: Lesotho's ICT service exports were valued at just $15,183 in 2023, reflecting minimal participation in the global digital economy.

title: Minimal Threatened Fish Species
description: As of 2018, Lesotho had only one fish species classified as threatened, highlighting a relatively stable aquatic ecosystem.

title: Low Central Government Debt
description: In 2020, Lesotho's central government debt was only 2.99% of GDP, indicating strong fiscal management.

title: Challenges in Business Regulation
description: The quality of regulations for business location in Lesotho scored 36.37 in 2024, suggesting room for improvement in the business environment.

title: High Female Participation in Secondary Education
description: In 2017, 57.38% of pupils in secondary education were female, showcasing gender inclusivity in education.

title: Strong Female Representation in Vocational Training
description: 66.59% of vocational pupils were female in 2017, indicating a strong female presence in vocational education.

title: Limited Rural Handwashing Facilities
description: Only 3.55% of the rural population had access to basic handwashing facilities in 2022, highlighting a critical public health issue.

title: High Female Mortality from Unintentional Poisoning
description: The mortality rate for females due to unintentional poisoning was 3.1 per 100,000 in 2021, indicating a significant health concern.

title: High Suicide Mortality Rate
description: In 2021, Lesotho had a suicide mortality rate of 28.66 per 100,000, reflecting a serious mental health challenge.

title: High Mortality from Unsafe Water and Sanitation
description: The mortality rate due to unsafe water and sanitation was 108.1 per 100,000 in 2019, underscoring a major public health issue.

title: Significant Female Employment in Industry
description: In 2023, 38.52% of female employment was in the industry sector, highlighting women's participation in industrial jobs.

title: High Adult Female Mortality Rate
description: The adult female mortality rate was 361.61 per 1,000 in 2023, indicating significant health challenges for women.

title: High Adult Male Mortality Rate
description: In 2023, the adult male mortality rate was 470.60 per 1,000, reflecting severe health issues among men.

title: High Imports from Sub-Saharan Africa
description: 84.96% of Lesotho's merchandise imports in 2023 came from Sub-Saharan Africa, indicating strong regional trade ties.

title: Dependence on Travel Services for Commercial Imports
description: Travel services constituted 74.87% of Lesotho's commercial service imports in 2023, showing a heavy reliance on this sector.
